ygData.subject: Re: neglected melee skills..
ygData.msgSnippet: You have to use stuff on BLUE or greater creatures to advance melee skills.  This might apply to other combat oriented skills as well.  You have to go out and
ygData.messageBody:
You have to use stuff on BLUE or greater creatures to advance melee
skills. This might apply to other combat oriented skills as well. You have
to go out and take a chance on things, which is a good reason for swapping
weapons a lot in the early levels where fighting blues isn't so tough as it
will be when you start hitting 16+. ;)

Malark on Karana

> -----Original Message-----
> From: McCartney, Michael R [mailto:Michael.McCartney2@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, May 12, 1999 10:38 AM
> To: 'EQ_spell_research@onelist.com'
> Subject: [EQ_spell_research] neglected melee skills..
>
>
> From: "McCartney, Michael R" <Michael.McCartney2@...>
>
> I forgot to work on my piercing skills for about 4 levels...
> then when I went back to using a Giant snake fang.. it wont
> increase my skill.. Do I have to put some practice points
> into it? Or does it just take longer to get back to increasing?
>
> Drev, level 16 wizard on Tarew Marr
>
>
